mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM, p.prog_title, r.rev_dog_id, r.rev_prog_id, r.rev_title, r.rev_content, avg(r.rev_rate) from program p join review r on p.prog_id = r.rev_prog_id group by ROWNUM, p.prog_title, r.rev_dog_id, r.rev_prog_id, r.rev_title, r.rev_content order by avg(r.rev_rate) desc) where ROWNUM between 1 and 1

select * from (select rownum as rn, r.*, p.prog_title, d.dog_mem_id from review r join program p on r.rev_prog_id = p.prog_id join dog d on r.rev_dog_id = d.dog_id
) T1 where rn between ((nvl(#{pageNum},0)-1)*#{amount})+1 and (nvl(#{pageNum},0)*#{amount})
select count(*) from (select rownum as rn, r.*, p.prog_title, d.dog_mem_id from review r join program p on r.rev_prog_id = p.prog_id join dog d on r.rev_dog_id = d.dog_id)

select distinct r.*, p.prog_title, d.dog_mem_id from review r join program p on r.rev_prog_id = p.prog_id join dog d on r.rev_dog_id = d.dog_id join apply a on p.prog_id = a.apply_prog_id where r.rev_prog_id = #{revProgId} and r.rev_dog_id = #{revDogId} and a.apply_status = 1 and p.prog_status = 1
select count(*) from review where rev_prog_id = #{revProgId} and rev_dog_id = #{revDogId}

select ROWNUM as rn, A.* from (select r.rev_prog_id, avg(r.rev_rate), p.prog_title, p.prog_content, p.prog_trmem_id, r.rev_title, r.rev_content, r.rev_dog_id from review r join program p on r.rev_prog_id = p.prog_id group by r.rev_prog_id, p.prog_title, p.prog_content, p.prog_trmem_id, r.rev_title, r.rev_content, r.rev_dog_id order by avg(r.rev_rate) desc) A where ROWNUM between 1 and 3
